== Main Inclusion Report for usbmuxd ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/u/usbmuxd]]</nowiki>; available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Depends for libiphone which is a requirement for the new gvfs afc backend
 0. ''Security:''
** <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=usbmuxd|CVE entries]]</nowiki>: no CVE entries
** <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=usbmuxd|Secunia history]]</nowiki>: no secunia history
** No setuid or setgid binary but a daemon which talks to usb devices
** No network activity but dialogs with iphone devices over usb cable
** Deal with devices not files
** Any source code review performed ? No but upstream would welcome a review + opinions on device access restriction
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Work out of the box
** No debconf question
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:usbmuxd|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>: Not in Debian

** [[http://marcansoft.com/blog/iphonelinux/usbmuxd/] is seeing a slow number of commits
** <nowiki>[[Upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>: No bug tracker but a mailing list
** Hardware: it talks to iphone devices
** No test suite
 0. ''UI standards:''
** No user interface, no user string, no translation

 0. ''Dependencies:''
** libusb which is in main
